page.title: 07SATURDAYS
page.content: As soon as I go downstairs in the morning I put the T.V. on if mum and dad are not already up. I watch T.V. for a while and then I go and get dressed. When I am dressed I come back down and make a drink of tea or coffee, have a slice of bread and jam or toast. Then as it is Saturday I get out one of my library books and settle down to read. After about an hour I go and get my sister up and we go out to play. When my mum gets up she sends us out to the shop for something for our dinner. After dinner we go shopping to Fine Fare supermarket. When we come back we have our tea and go for a walk. When we get in we have our supper and go to bed.
